attributes.action: Call a General Election for January 2023
attributes.additional_details: The people of the Uk did not vote for Liz Truss or her policies. The world has changed beyond recognition since the last general election with entirely different short and long term problems to deal with. The public MUST be given the power to choose who is best to lead the country. The current policies of the government have the potential for irrevocable damage which must be prevented through public scrutiny.
attributes.background: Hold a general election in January 2023 or as soon as is otherwise practical.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

Hold a General Election within 100 days of the new PM being appointed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621931

Set the date of the next General Election for 2 May 2023: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611905
